record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 1415

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that S. 1415, introduced earlier today by Senator Reid, is at the desk, and I ask for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will read the title of the bill.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I now ask for its second reading and object to my own request.
Mr. President, I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
